TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDbTransactionInterceptor implements class System.Data.Entity.Infrastructure.Interception.IDbInterceptor

Docs.summary: An object that implements this interface can be registered with to receive notifications when Entity Framework commits or rollbacks a transaction.
Docs.remarks: Interceptors can also be registered in the config file of the application. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=260883 for more information about Entity Framework configuration.
